dateInput.enterCalendar: Calendar is open, press tab to enter the calendar

fileInput.maxSizeSingle: The file is too large. Select a file no larger than {maxSize}.

maxSizeMultiple.singular: One file is too large. Select files which are no larger than {maxSize}.
maxSizeMultiple.plural: {numOfFiles} files are too large. Select files which are no larger than {maxSize}.

fileInput.maxFile: Attach a maximum of {max} files only.

textInput.suggestionsExist: This input has suggestions use arrow keys to navigate
textInput.suggestionIsOpen: Suggestions drop is open, continue to use arrow keys to navigate
